bill.summary: 8/6/1998--Introduced. Federalism Act of 1998 - Directs the head of each Federal department and agency to ensure that each department or agency activity is carried out in accordance with all the provisions of Executive Order 12612 and Executive Order 12875 (relating to federalism) as in effect on October 26, 1987. Provides that Executive Order 13083, issued May 14, 1998, shall have no force or effect. Sets forth provisions governing judicial review of compliance by a department or agency with requirements or restrictions imposed by this Act. Authorizes a court to remand or invalidate a rule with respect to which a department or agency fails to perform any federalism assessment pursuant to this Act.
